alert.note: Alert for Harlan; Leslie; Letcher (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 1:29PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Harlan, southwestern Letcher and southeastern Leslie Counties through 200 PM EDT... At 129 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Colts, or 9 miles east of Harlan, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Hiram and Gordon around 135 PM EDT. Cumberland, Lynch, Benham, Rock House, Clover, Clover Fork, Holmes Mill, Clutts, Blair and Kingdom Come S.P. around 140 PM EDT. Big Black Mountain, Lewis Creek, Partridge and Maggard around 145 PM EDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM EDT for southeastern Kentucky.
